theme.title: Αρχική+Θέμα
theme.friendly_accent: Αλλάξτε το φόντο και το χρώμα έμφασης της συσκευής σας, για να ταιριάζει με τη διάθεσή σας σήμερα, αυτήν την εβδομάδα ή όλο το μήνα.
theme.friendly_tiles: Μπορείτε να αλλάξετε το μέγεθος και τον αριθμό των πλακιδίων που είναι διαθέσιμα στην οθόνη έναρξης.

screen_rotation.title: Περιστροφή Οθόνης
screen_rotation.friendly_rotation_lock: Όταν είναι ενεργοποιημένο το κλείδωμα περιστροφής, η οθόνη σας θα παραμένει στον τρέχοντα προσανατολισμό όταν περιστρέφετε τη συσκευή σας.

reduce_motion.title: Reduce motion
reduce_motion.description: Reduce motion effects, such as parallax and animations, to help prevent motion sickness.

high_contrast.title: High contrast
high_contrast.description: Changes the colors for some features, and hides some of their background images.

haptic_feedback.title: Haptic Feedback
haptic_feedback.description: Enable vibration feedback when interacting with tiles and controls.

reset.title: Reset Groove Launcher?
reset.message: This will reset your launcher to its default settings. All customizations will be lost.

root.title: Root Access Required
root.message: Root access is required to perform this action. Please grant root access to continue.

shizuku.title: Shizuku Permission Required
shizuku.message: Shizuku permission is required to perform this action. Please grant Shizuku permission to continue.

update_available.title: Update Available!
update_available.message: A new version ({{version}}) is available, sized at {{size}}. Would you like to download it?
update_available.message2: A new version ({{version}}) is available. Would you like to download it?

update_check_failed.title: Update Check Failed!
update_check_failed.message: Unable to check for app updates. Please try again later.

up_to_date.title: Up to Date!
up_to_date.message: You have the grooviest version of Groove Launcher.

font_read_error.title: Unsupported file format
font_read_error.message: The font file isn’t valid. Make sure it’s a .ttf file and try uploading again.

font_load_error.title: Can’t load font
font_load_error.message: We couldn’t read the font file. Only .ttf fonts are supported. Please try a different file.

copy_failed.title: Copy Failed!
copy_failed.message: Unable to copy apps list. Please try again.

copy_success.title: Copied to Clipboard!
copy_success.message: Installed apps copied to JSON format successfully.

apps.show_in_app_list: Show this app in App List
apps.name: Name
